caption.p: Survival analysis revealed high-risk score are positively correlated to poor survival. (A) Survival analysis of low- and high-risk subgroups in the TCGA train group. (B) ROC curves for forecasting overall survival (OS) based on risk score in the TCGA train group. (C) Expression heat map, risk score distribution, and survival status in the TCGA train group. (D) Survival analysis of low- and high-risk subgroups in the GEO test group; (E) ROC curves for forecasting overall survival (OS) based on risk score in the GEO test group. (F) Expression heat map, risk score distribution, and survival status in the GEO test group.
